full_summary:
**Title**: ITQ for Shoreline Protection in Grand Etang, Nova Scotia
================================moon=====================

**Tender Information**
---------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3718494221-DS3720687426
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Submission Deadline**: November 10, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Project Overview**
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a contractor to perform shoreline protection work in Grand Etang, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. The project involves:

*   Condoté useless of the existing shore protection for reuse in the new constructe ..
*   Supply and installation of new corestone, filterstone, and armourstone as required for the construction of the new shoreline protection.

** Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The contractor will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

*   Nova Scotia

**Region of Delivery**
--------------------

*   Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity Information**
----------------------------(

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**
-------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)

*   **Email**: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

*   **Phone**: (None)

*   **Fax**: (None)

**NOTICE URL**
--------------

You can access more information on the tender by visiting this URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14459375>
